root: ^Tony, we have to get out. It's here, it -
^Calm down, man. You're not making sense.
^We have to get out - it's coming, we can't -
^I saw it again - I think it's following me.
^I think it followed me HERE. It won't -
^Joe... you're sounding a bit crazy, man. Just take a few breaths. I'm here.
^Every monster story anyone's ever told - ghosts, werewolves, bigfoot...
^I've heard them all, man. And none of them are real.
^It's like - like lightning, making people believe in Zeus.
^Making up stories to explain fear they don't understand.
^In the end, it's all just people and the wild.
^It's alright, Joe. I get it. I've been doing this longer than you, and I've had a couple scares too.
^It's something about the isolation. Lets you get up in your own head.
^It's... it's not like that. I know what I saw.
^Just keep breathing, man. We'll keep going together. No matter how old you get, I'm still gonna be here to chase the monsters away.
^You can't - you can't just do that!Say you'll fix everything. You can't.
^Stop treating me like a fucking child!
^Every time - every time I talk to you, you can't resist it.
^You want me to do that, don't you?
^We'll let Matthew go the rest of the way - we'll find Drake -
^You want me to turn back. You never thought I could do this -
